task.summary: First commit defining the whole project structure
- First version of the domain - Bootstrapping & web configuration
- Simple persistence support with row mapping (avoiding the use of very heavy ORM)
- Simple persistence support with row mapping (avoiding the use of very heavy ORM)
- Enhance persistence support - Add some tests
Add REST resource for cellar management
